verses.name: Leviticus 13:46
verses.text: All the days wherein the plague shall be in him he shall be defiled; he is unclean: he shall dwell alone; without the camp shall his habitation be.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:47
verses.text: The garment also that the plague of leprosy is in, whether it be a woollen garment, or a linen garment;

verses.name: Leviticus 13:48
verses.text: Whether it be in the warp, or woof; of linen, or of woollen; whether in a skin, or in any thing made of skin;
